body.name: Furnulem White Nightstand with 3 Drawers and 2-Tier Shelf, Small Night Stand End Table Side Furniture, Fabric Storage Organizer for Bedroom, Closet, Hallway, Nursery, Sturdy Steel Frame, Wood Top
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 47 mins
features: 【Multi-scene Application】This nightstand is designed in a modern concise style, which is attractive and functional, making it suitable for any room. It can be a beside table in the bedroom or an end table in living room, also great for closets, nurseries, entryways, hallways, offices, playrooms, children's room and more.

【Double Display Shelf】Specially designed with the double-layer shelf. The wooden top is solid and wear-resistant. It can display vases, photo frames, lamps, decorations, etc. Or it can be used to place glasses, alarm clocks, books, chargers and other sundries, which is not only convenient and practical but also artistic as a decor.

【Durable Storage Drawer】Features foldable storage drawers. Each fabric drawer (NOT WOOD) offers large storage space, perfect for organizing clothes, toys, socks, underwear, scarves, blankets and other accessories. The drawers are made of PVC fabric, lightweight and durable, and won't pinch hands, also safe for child to use.

【Sturdy Structure】The night stand is made with sturdy metal frame, which offers high strength support and ensure years of use. The overall frame is stable, and it weighs only 12 pounds, isn’t bulky and easy to move. Anti-toppling device is provided to prevent it from falling down. Fully guaranteed stability and safety.

【Easy to Assemble】The package includes all the tools and accessories, you can install it in 20 minutes with the instruction. The wood table is slim and light, and does not take up much space. Perfect Gift for a housewarming or your family and friends. Overall dimension: 11.5"D x16.1"W x 28.3"H

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Bedroom 2 Living Room 3 Entryway

SHELF WITH BACK BOARD The second shelf of the dresser has an additional back board to ensure that it is more stable and can effectively prevent small items from falling. STURDY STEEL FRAME The dresser is made with sturdy metal frame, which offers stable support, and making it capable of bearing more weight. Fully guaranteed stability. ANTI TIP KIT Friendly to kids or young ones. Fixing the dresser on the wall with the anti-tip kit can provide a safe environment for your family. ADJUSTABLE FEET The storage dresser is equiped with 4 adjustable feet which can help to adjust the height of the dresser if your ground is uneven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive, functional, good quality
reviews.reviewText: This piece is as advertised. The build quality is very good, the dimensions are accurate, and it was easy to assemble. All parts are labeled and instructions are clear. It's an attractive and functional addition to my bedroom. Pic included is before I cluttered it up with all my stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was having a hard time finding a nightstand that was tall enough for my 30+ inch tall bed and this piece did the trick! It’s the perfect height and just lots of storage. The drawers have a nice pleather finish on the front to make them look fancier than just a regular fabric drawer. The handles are a tan plastic but from a distance looks nice almost like a gold accent. The drawers open easily and hold a lot. The top shelf is a little smaller than I’d hope for but the second shelf and then the drawers make up for it. Very easy to put together, maybe took 20 minutes, and came with all the tools needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Strong metal frame
reviews.reviewText: The simple instructions to put this together is great. Took about 10 minutes to finish. The metal frame is very sturdy and good quality. The only thing lacking was the pull handles for the drawers (made from cheap plastic). I simply replaced those with metal pulls of my choice. Overall great value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy with the product
reviews.reviewText: I have three pieces of the style furniture in my sewing room. Love the look, sturdy frame, easy to assemble, comes complete with tool, and extra hardware in case you lose a bolt or screw. A simple to follow diagram. Just have to make sure the little drawer back stop is in the back on both pieces of frame work. The fabric drawers are great for storage of lighter weight items. For the price, a great item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This dresser was perfect for the space I needed. Orginally I thought this was all would but once put together I found the drawers were felt material with wood look but they are actually more durable then I thought. I have clothes in it and no problems with it changing shapes. Was very easy to put together. I love the color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I fell for it again
reviews.reviewText: First mistake that I keep making and then somehow forget, I search for a tall nightstand. Amazon search doesn't weed out ones that do not fit in the search terms, to get you to buy. I am the fool that bought.Second, I over estimate humans. I think their business ethics would prevent them from selling white trash stuff. The price is low but I have seen particle board things that are low price.Mine did not come with instructions, and I haven't assembled it yet. The hardware is marked with letters so I'm hoping that's enough. I do wish every thing that came with a users manual or instructions always included a link on the product page, to a printable manual or instructions.The drawers are made of some sort of synthetic forever chemical fabric and they unfold to open, much like a large purse or canvas bag. The frame is indeed metal and the top is particle board.A crafty person could save all their cardboard boxers and craft a equally strong and aesthetically pleasing night stand, even without the metal frame. Will I have finally learned my lesson to not trust Amazon's search results. Stay tuned to find out. dun dun dunnnnUpdate. I assembled it and it is a tall night stand. It's about 10" taller than standard old fashioned night stands that I would have to reach downward a bit, to reach.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality night stand
reviews.reviewText: I was almost done putting the dresser together when I noticed one of the screw holes was not drilled on one side of the wood. No big deal. I can drill it in. Then I realized the racks that hold the drawers were welded BACKWARDS, rendering the whole thing useless. Disappointed.-------UPDATEFurnulem customer support reached out and sent me a replacement. I was very impressed with their customer service.Once I was able to actually put the dresser together, I was very impressed by the quality. The drawers are fabric, which makes them easy to put together and slide out. It is very stable so I don't anticipate any issue with it breaking.Overall I would recommend this product if you need a nice little night stand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Simple assembly, work great for us, look good too. These are not solid wood drawers, read description. They are nice for the price.
